description: Vivid beetroot, silky whipped feta and fresh herbs make this salad stand out from the crowd. Serve this stunning salad as part of your festive spread.
name: Beetroot & Tomato Salad With Whipped Feta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g whole cooked beetroot, drained, thinly sliced
0.5 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds
1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Place creme fraiche and feta in a food processor and process until smooth. Add lemon juice and process until just combined. Season with pepper.
Spread whipped feta mixture over base of a platter. Top with salad leaves, beetroot, tomato, onion and herbs. Serve drizzled with oil and seasoned with pepper.
